message.content: {"given_definition_quality":85,"better_definition":"piece (a measure word for things and people)","sentence":"一个人。","image_prompt":"Create an animation-style image in a soft apocalypse theme showing a single person standing alone in a quiet, empty landscape. There is a gentle, eerie light, with some ruins or abandoned buildings in the distance, and soft, faded colors. The person looks contemplative and calm. Include no other people, and keep the style gentle and slightly surreal.","sentence_translation":"One person."}
